transport.question: I go choo-choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?
I have wheels and go vroom! You can ride in me. What am I?
I float on the water and help people travel. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to move. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You can fall if you don't balance.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚸 I help children get to class.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?
I'm a car that helps people when they're hurt. I have a siren. What am I?
I'm big and I carry lots of things. I help to build buildings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I can carry rocks and sand.

transport.question: I fly high above the ground with spinning blades. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚨 Sometimes I help people in danger.

transport.question: I go very fast and take people underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I'm a great way to get around town.

plant.question: I am green and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am yellow when I am ripe
🌴 I grow where it is warm

plant.question: I am red and round and yummy to eat. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can put me in a salad
❤️ I am often the color of love

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked
💪 I am good for your eyes

plant.question: I'm tall and have a trunk and green leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give shade on a sunny day
🪵 You can make things out of my wood
🍁 My leaves can change colors in the fall (autumn)

plant.question: I am a plant that has pretty petals and smells very nice. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I need sunshine and water to grow
🌹 I come in many different colors

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable that is orange on the inside. You can carve a face into me at Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make pie out of me

plant.question: I am a plant that has sharp needles and stays green all year long. People decorate me at Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ People put a star on top of me
🎄 I am a type of evergreen tree

plant.question: I am a plant with a brown shell and sometimes a green inside. People like to eat me as a snack. What am I?
I grow in the ground and have a bumpy skin. You can mash me and put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make fries out of me
🥣 I am a type of vegetable

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs and has purple, green, or red round fruit. You can make juice and jelly from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 Some people make wine with me
☀️ I grow on a vine in the sun
